title: Instructional Design Workshop for Proficiency Analysis: A Systematic Literature Review-Based Practical Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Instructional Design Theory and Over 3 Years of Practical Experience
context.additional_context: Analysis of core competencies required for instructional design roles in post-COVID-19 educational environments, exploring alignment with the ATD competency model. Strengthens practical application via smartphone-based VR simulations.

learning_goals: Analyze over 50 job postings to derive the top five core competencies in instructional design (e.g., technology application, collaborative leadership)
Compare and analyze the 23 competencies of the ATD Talent Development Capability Model against actual job requirements
Design competency-based instructional solutions in VR simulation environments and submit improvements incorporating peer feedback

resources: Access to Online Job Posting Database
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
